body.description: Keep this boxed set on hand for planned (or unplanned) birthday celebrations and extend warm wishes for that special day!Premium boxed stationery set comes with 14 ''Happy Birthday'' Note Cards and 15 matching envelopes.Superior card stock takes pen beautifully.Card interiors are blank for your personal message.Birthday design features an assortment of candles in teal, apricot, and gold foil, all alight beneath a sprinkling of foil dots and the words ''Happy Birthday.'' Unique linen finish adds tactile appeal.Set includes matching aqua-hued envelopes with white polka-dots on the flaps.Cards measure 5'' wide x 3-1/2'' high. Read more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Happy Birthday Note Cards Set Keep these cards handy for sending Happy Birthday wishes!

Premium boxed stationery set comes with 14 note cards and 15 matching envelopes Happy Birthday Birthday cards feature an array of candles in teal, apricot, and gold foil, beneath a sprinkling of gold foil dots.''Happy Birthday'' appears in script.Card exteriors feature a unique linen finish. Superior card stock Inside, quality card stock takes pen beautifully.Smooth writing surface—no smudging or streaking, no gel pens required. Matching envelopes included Stationery envelopes are made of quality paper.Matching aqua-hued envelopes feature a white polka-dot pattern on the flaps.We include an extra envelope, just in case it is needed.

Beautiful note cards are a pleasure to use Keep this boxed set on hand for planned (or unplanned) birthday celebrations and extend warm wishes for that special day! Premium boxed set features crisp note cards of substantial stock, and stationery envelopes constructed of quality paper.Stationery set comes in a matching box with a clear acetate lid. About our Happy Birthday Note Cards: Set comes with 14 folded note cards with blank interiors. 15 matching stationery envelopes. Cards measure 5" wide x 3-1/2" high. Stationery set comes in a matching box with a clear acetate lid.
Music Note Cards Smiley Face Note Cards Rainbow Note Cards Typewriter Note Cards Llama Note Cards Sympathy Note Cards

Our Company History In 1928, at the age of twenty-two, Peter Beilenson began printing books on a small press in the basement of his parents’ home in Larchmont, New York. Peter—and later, his wife, Edna—sought to create fine books that sold at prices even a pauper could afford. Today, still family owned and operated, Peter Pauper Press continues to honor our founders’ legacy—and our customers’ expectations—of beauty, quality, and value. Image: Peter Pauper Press headquarters, circa 1948.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More Beautiful In Person
reviews.reviewText: These birthday note cards from Peter Pauper Press are much more beautiful when you see them in person. The pictures don't do them justice. I love the linen texture on the front and back of the cards, and the smooth inside takes fountain pen ink beautifully, indicating that this is high quality card stock. The gold foil candles and polka dots on the front of the card are very pretty. I'm finding that note cards from the Peter Pauper Press are really well-designed and a tremendous value for the money. Right now I have six boxes of their cards, and many of the people I send them to are actually complimenting me on how nice they are. Check them out! Odds are, you'll love them, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful! I would order again
reviews.reviewText: These are beautiful! Really good quality, and I’m very picky. The cards have a linen texture on the outside. The envelopes are a nice weight and the polka dots are a cute touch. I have other items by Peter Pauper Press and they are always nice quality, but I was a bit hesitant to order these since there were just a handful of reviews. These are nicer than I expected and I’m very happy. I would definitely order them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super nice cards from PPP
reviews.reviewText: PPP makes the stationary and journals I almost exclusively buy now after trying my first set of navy blue thank you cards. The craft and luxury each card seems to hold us just phenomenal and in bulk these will surprise you. I love these cards!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will probably buy more
reviews.reviewText: Arrived quickly, exactly as described, very nice quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECTLY HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE
reviews.reviewText: This box of birthday cards with blank inside sections is exactly as advertisied. The weight of the card stock is good, the illustration on the front of the cards is crisp and bright, and the colored envelopes are very attractive This is a great item to keep on hand for those times when you are in need of a birthday card for someone/anyone but you're not able to run to the store. You can personalize these cards with your own special message.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality
reviews.reviewText: I recommend these birthday cards. Very nicely made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! Great quality note cards
reviews.reviewText: I bought these so that I’d have birthday cards available for those times when I realize it’s close to someone’s birthday but don’t have time to shop for a card. These are lovely, well-made cards that look even better in person than they do in the photos. I’m very happy with these!

reviews.reviewTitle: Cards are great for any birthday.
reviews.reviewText: Cards are perfect for any birthday. Great price and look. Buy these all the time. Have had a few different designs. Always a great buy.
Cards are good quality, very happy, cute matching envelopes too

Cards were nice but each envelope arrived with a crease in it so I had to return. Have reordered. Will let you know if it's still bad.EDIT: updating to 5 stars because my reordered ones are perfect. Would recommend.
Love these little note cards! Big enough to fit a gift card.
